data.title: List of books by author Harry Turtledove
data.meta_description: Get your Harry Turtledove books today! Pango Books has a huge selection of new and used titles to choose from. See all books including: The Victorious Opposition, Darkness Descending, The Gladiator, Aftershocks, Household Gods, Between the Rivers, In the Balance (Worldwar, Book One), Conan of Venarium, Upsetting the Balance (Worldwar, Book Three), Bombs Away, Breakthroughs, The Thousand Cities, Through the Darkness, Homeward Bound, Legion of Videssos, In High Places, The Tale of Krispos, Drive to the East (Settling Accounts, Book Two), Jaws of Darkness, Return Engagement, Out of the Darkness, In the Presence of Mine Enemies, The First Heroes, Ruled Britannia, Two Fronts, The Two Georges, Last Orders, Fallout, Hitler's War, Tilting the Balance, The Valley-Westside War, Into the Darkness, Gunpowder Empire, Alternate Generals, An Emperor for the Legion, Walk in Hell (the Great War, Book Two), Beyond the Gap, King of the North, American Front (the Great War, Book One), Kaleidoscope, Armistice, The Breath of God, Fox and Empire, Through Darkest Europe, Misplaced Legion, The Best Alternate History Stories of the 20th Century, Alpha and Omega, Liberating Atlantis, In at the Death, Counting up, Counting Down, Sentry Peak, Krispos of Videssos, Give Me Back My Legions!, Departures, Atlantis and Other Places, West and East (the War That Came Early, Book Two), Coup d'Etat (the War That Came Early, Book Four), The House of Daniel, Swords of the Legion, Three Miles Down, Fort Pillow, A World of Difference, Supervolcano, Every Inch a King, The Center Cannot Hold, Rulers of the Darkness, End of the Beginning, Straight Outta Dodge City, Exiled: Clan of the Claw, Krispos the Emperor, Curious Notions, Alternate Generals, The Big Switch (the War That Came Early, Book Three), Second Contact, The Disunited States of America, Days of Infamy, Three Miles Down, The Grapple, Striking the Balance (Worldwar, Book Four), Supervolcano: All Fall Down, Alternate Generals III, Down to Earth (Colonization, Book Two), Wisdom of the Fox, The United States of Atlantis, Opening Atlantis, The Guns of the South, Supervolcano: Things Fall Apart, How Few Remain, Alternate Generals II, Krispos Rising (the Tale of Krispos, Book One), Worlds That Weren't, Earthgrip, The Man with the Iron Heart, Blood and Iron, The Best Time Travel Stories of the 20th Century
